# CapturedRoom.Section.Label.bathroom

**Case**

A distinct area that resembles a bathroom within a larger structure.

## Declaration

```swift
case bathroom
```

## Assigning a section a label

- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.livingRoom**: A distinct area that resembles a living room within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.kitchen**: A distinct area that resembles a kitchen within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.diningRoom**: A distinct area that resembles a dining room within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.bedroom**: A distinct area that resembles a bedroom within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.unidentified**: An uncategorized area within a larger structure.
